getSCAddress

String getSCAddress()
Parse and return the SC address prepended to SMS messages coming via the TS 27.005 / AT interface. Returns null on invalid address

constructUserData

int constructUserData(boolean hasUserDataHeader,
                      boolean dataInSeptets)
Pulls the user data out of the PDU, and separates the payload from the header if there is one.

Parameters:
hasUserDataHeader - true if there is a user data header
dataInSeptets - true if the data payload is in septets instead of octets
Returns:
the number of septets or octets in the user data payload

getUserData

byte[] getUserData()
Returns the user data payload, not including the headers

Returns:
the user data payload, not including the headers

getUserDataSeptetPadding

int getUserDataSeptetPadding()
Returns the number of padding bits at the begining of the user data array before the start of the septets.

Returns:
the number of padding bits at the begining of the user data array before the start of the septets

getUserDataHeader

com.android.internal.telephony.gsm.SmsHeader getUserDataHeader()
Returns an object representing the user data headers

Returns:
an object representing the user data headers

getUserDataGSM7Bit

String getUserDataGSM7Bit(int septetCount)
Interprets the user data payload as pack GSM 7bit characters, and decodes them into a String.

Parameters:
septetCount - the number of septets in the user data payload
Returns:
a String with the decoded characters

getUserDataUCS2

String getUserDataUCS2(int byteCount)
Interprets the user data payload as UCS2 characters, and decodes them into a String.

Parameters:
byteCount - the number of bytes in the user data payload
Returns:
a String with the decoded characters
